short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to export a sales order, item fulfillment, purchase order and invoice to csv.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
NetSuite users can export sales order, item fulfillment, invoice and purchase order to csv file.

12-14-21 Sales order export includes the record internal id.
02-03-22 SPS Commerce Item fields added, BPN and VPN.
09-07-23 Export purchase orders
07-22-24 Export additional custom column
